DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Bilateral Mammogram Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The occurrence date of a low voltage X-ray photograph of the breast generally done to detect breast cancer, affecting both sides of the body, or a matched pair of organs.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A low voltage X-ray photograph of the breast generally done to detect breast cancer, affecting both sides of the body, or a matched pair of organs.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Affecting both sides of the body, or a matched pair of organs.:A low voltage X-ray photograph of the breast generally done to detect breast cancer. This method is also valuable in diagnosis of benign abnormal conditions of the breast such as fibroadenoma, mastitis, abscess, and cysts.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Affecting both sides of the body or a matched pair of organs.

A low voltage X-ray photograph of the breast generally done to detect breast cancer. This method is also valuable in diagnosis of benign abnormal conditions of the breast such as fibroadenoma, mastitis, abscess, and cysts.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
